price: 82. Caagid usun elle yakkalen inna hinna ama ken Yallitte akeeral ken qibaada angaddeeleeh Qaduwwiy saduh keenil yani keenil akke-le.
arabic: كَلَّاۚ سَيَكۡفُرُونَ بِعِبَادَتِهِمۡ وَيَكُونُونَ عَلَيۡهِمۡ ضِدًّا

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: kallā sayakfurūna biʿibādatihim wayakūnūna ʿalayhim ḍiddan
